trans-unit.source: The "Mark Change" dialogue allows to tag changes as del or ins and add a timestamp to it.
Clicking the "Mark Change" icon in the RTE tool bar opens a dialogue that allows to chose if the selected text has been inserted or deleted and add a timestamp to the tag.

trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: "Mark Change" icon in the editor tool bar.
